release.action: Fixed a bug which lead to currencies getting returned for dates before the starting date. This stops returning the EUR currency for dates before 01/01/2002. Additionally made property dtausCode of XML currency instances optional to not force all currencies to have a corresponding DTAUS code.

Fixed a bug where time information was not discarded from given dates leading to not always returning correct currencies when matching dates exactly. Updated the POM removing hardcoded signing aliases.
Updated entity classes to cache hash codes and stopped creating objects during hash code computation. Added some more test cases.
